page.title: 11SHOPS IN PRENTON DELL
page.content: The shops in{Prenton Dell}were built about thirty-five years ago. There are thirteen altogether, constructed from bricks, the roofs being tiled. All the shops have living accommodation above them. They serve a small mature council estate and privately owned residential property. There are a{butcher,}a{greengrocer, a {chemist}and{post-office,}a{petshop, a small{supermarket, newsagent, {off-licence}and an{exclusive dress {shop.}Services provided are{take-away {food, hairdressers}and a{betting shop. There is also a small{library. The pavement furniture includes a post-box positioned during the reign of{Elizabeth II.}There are two bus stops, one with a shelter, pedestrian barriers and concrete lampposts.
